<title level="1" right="Action">[Quick Tincture](/Actions.aspx?ID=547) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Cost** 1 versatile vial

**Requirements** You know the formula for the alchemical item you're creating, you are holding or wearing [alchemist's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), and you have a free hand.

</column>

---

You quickly brew up a short-lived tincture. You create a single [alchemical elixir](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) or [tool](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) of your level or lower without having to spend the normal monetary cost in alchemical reagents or needing to attempt a [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) check. This item has the [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=94) trait, but it remains potent only until the end of the current turn.
